verbs.description: ABC News [V: has] issued an apology after a false graphic flashed on the screen during a special report with President Donald Trump . The graphic showed the headline : " Manafort Pleads Guilty to 5 Charges of Manslaughter , " apparently referring to former Trump campaign manager Paul Manafort .
